title: 11 Nordstrom Bags For Every Winter Occasion
description: We can always count on Nordstrom as a go-to for our favorite shoes, sweaters, denim, and handbags. Aside from looking great, a quality bag should be able to hold all of your essentials while being easy to wear and versatile enough to be teamed with numerous outfits. We've uncovered a variety of options that incorporate the season's biggest trends while also considering longevity and practicality. Whether you need a small but elegant bag to carry for date night, a tote bag for your work commute, a crossbody or belt bag for travel, or a water-resistant bag for beach and pool days, we have options for everything. With a wide range of budgets in mind, there are affordable picks starting at just $50, as well as designer bags you'll wear for years. We've cherry-picked a mix of customer favorites as well as options our own editors are eyeing. Despite what your personal aesthetic is, or the type of bag you're looking for, you're bound to find just the right one to team with everything from jeans to dresses. Keep reading to shop our favorite Nordstrom bags this season.
author: Angela Elias
excerpt: The best bags at Nordstrom, including crossbody, shoulder, tote, and waist bags. We found options under $100, as well as designer bags worth the splurge.
text: Skip to main contentWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.We can always count on Nordstrom as a go-to for our favorite shoes, sweaters, denim, and handbags. Aside from looking great, a quality bag should be able to hold all of your essentials while being easy to wear and versatile enough to be teamed with numerous outfits. We've uncovered a variety of options that incorporate the season's biggest trends while also considering longevity and practicality. Whether you need a small but elegant bag to carry for date night, a tote bag for your work commute, a crossbody or belt bag for travel, or a water-resistant bag for beach and pool days, we have options for everything. With a wide range of budgets in mind, there are affordable picks starting at just $50, as well as designer bags you'll wear for years. We've cherry-picked a mix of customer favorites as well as options our own editors are eyeing. Despite what your personal aesthetic is, or the type of bag you're looking for, you're bound to find just the right one to team with everything from jeans to dresses. Keep reading to shop our favorite Nordstrom bags this season.nordstrom.comBest Mini Shopper BagMango Mini Faux Leather Shopper Bag ($50) The shopper shape of this bag feels undeniably classic. You can choose between using the top handle or the crossbody strap. It also has a zippered middle compartment to keep cash and other valuables safe.nordstrom.comBest Faux Leather SatchelAldo Kalanie Faux Leather Top Handle Bag ($70) The structured exterior of this bag opens up to reveal compartments, so it's easier to keep valuables intact. We love the gold hardware details and the longer strap that allows you to carry it on your arm or over your shoulder.nordstrom.comBest Hobo BagJW PEI Gabbi Ruched Faux Leather Hobo ($89) This ruched faux leather bag has a distinct '90s vibe and comes in four different color options, ranging from versatile neutrals to bolder brights. It's a favorite among celebrities and is water-repellent, so it's ready for the rain.nordstrom.comBest Belt BagDagne Dover Ace Belt Bag ($95) This belt bag is sporty, easy, and stylish. It's perfect for traveling because you can keep valuables close, and is also great for running errands. The water-resistant, scuba-knit fabric will keep anything you have inside dry, and the four pockets make it easy to stay organized.nordstrom.comBest Bucket Tote BagMadewell The Essential Bucket Tote ($178) Crafted from leather, this bucket tote has clean lines and can hold a 15-inch laptop, water bottle, phone, keys, and other essentials. It features a magnetic closure and an interior pocket. You can grab it in black or warm cinnamon.nordstrom.comBest Convertible ClutchAllSaints Yua Leather Clutch ($229) Keep the chunky gold chain on this clutch for an extra dose of edgy eye candy, or remove it for a clean and classic look. Either way, this roomy leather clutch — with its magnetic snap closure and interior wall and phone pockets — will become a staple for dinner and drinks.nordstrom.comBest Large ToteTory Burch Ella Patent Nylon Tote ($248) If you're looking for a bigger tote to fit a laptop and other necessities, this nylon bag from Tory Burch is an excellent choice. It's made from recycled nylon and features patent faux leather straps and an emblem pocket where you can stash your phone and lip gloss.nordstrom.comBest Saddle BagAllSaints Mini Miro Leather Saddle Bag ($249) The polished gold studs add a bit of edge to the classic, equestrian-inspired shape of this bag. It features an adjustable crossbody strap, an exterior slip pocket, dual interior compartments with a center divider, and a zip pocket.nordstrom.comBest Woven Tote BagNaghedi St. Barths Medium Tote ($285) Naghedi's woven bags are popping up everywhere, but we can't resist this subdued neutral tone for winter. It's water-resistant and features an interior zipper pouch to keep your essentials organized. You can carry the straps in your hand, over your forearm, or over the shoulder.nordstrom.comBest Bow-Style BagCuyana Mini Bow Leather Top Handle Bag ($298) Sculptural and elegant, we love how this Cuyana bow bag can be worn around the shoulder with the gold chain or as a minimal clutch with the chain removed. It's crafted in Italy with a pebbled leather exterior, has an interior wall pocket, and also comes in black.-— Additional reporting by Natasha MarshAngela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.Natasha Marsh (she/her) is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

We can always count on Nordstrom as a go-to for our favorite shoes, sweaters, denim, and handbags. Aside from looking great, a quality bag should be able to hold all of your essentials while being easy to wear and versatile enough to be teamed with numerous outfits. We've uncovered a variety of options that incorporate the season's biggest trends while also considering longevity and practicality. Whether you need a small but elegant bag to carry for date night, a tote bag for your work commute, a crossbody or belt bag for travel, or a water-resistant bag for beach and pool days, we have options for everything.

With a wide range of budgets in mind, there are affordable picks starting at just $50, as well as designer bags you'll wear for years. We've cherry-picked a mix of customer favorites as well as options our own editors are eyeing. Despite what your personal aesthetic is, or the type of bag you're looking for, you're bound to find just the right one to team with everything from jeans to dresses. Keep reading to shop our favorite Nordstrom bags this season.

Best Mini Shopper Bag

Mango Mini Faux Leather Shopper Bag ($50)

The shopper shape of this bag feels undeniably classic. You can choose between using the top handle or the crossbody strap. It also has a zippered middle compartment to keep cash and other valuables safe.

Best Faux Leather Satchel

Aldo Kalanie Faux Leather Top Handle Bag ($70)

The structured exterior of this bag opens up to reveal compartments, so it's easier to keep valuables intact. We love the gold hardware details and the longer strap that allows you to carry it on your arm or over your shoulder.

Best Hobo Bag

JW PEI Gabbi Ruched Faux Leather Hobo ($89)

This ruched faux leather bag has a distinct '90s vibe and comes in four different color options, ranging from versatile neutrals to bolder brights. It's a favorite among celebrities and is water-repellent, so it's ready for the rain.

Best Belt Bag

Dagne Dover Ace Belt Bag ($95)

This belt bag is sporty, easy, and stylish. It's perfect for traveling because you can keep valuables close, and is also great for running errands. The water-resistant, scuba-knit fabric will keep anything you have inside dry, and the four pockets make it easy to stay organized.

Best Bucket Tote Bag

Madewell The Essential Bucket Tote ($178)

Crafted from leather, this bucket tote has clean lines and can hold a 15-inch laptop, water bottle, phone, keys, and other essentials. It features a magnetic closure and an interior pocket. You can grab it in black or warm cinnamon.

Best Convertible Clutch

AllSaints Yua Leather Clutch ($229)

Keep the chunky gold chain on this clutch for an extra dose of edgy eye candy, or remove it for a clean and classic look. Either way, this roomy leather clutch — with its magnetic snap closure and interior wall and phone pockets — will become a staple for dinner and drinks.

Best Large Tote

Tory Burch Ella Patent Nylon Tote ($248)

If you're looking for a bigger tote to fit a laptop and other necessities, this nylon bag from Tory Burch is an excellent choice. It's made from recycled nylon and features patent faux leather straps and an emblem pocket where you can stash your phone and lip gloss.

Best Saddle Bag

AllSaints Mini Miro Leather Saddle Bag ($249)

The polished gold studs add a bit of edge to the classic, equestrian-inspired shape of this bag. It features an adjustable crossbody strap, an exterior slip pocket, dual interior compartments with a center divider, and a zip pocket.

Best Woven Tote Bag

Naghedi St. Barths Medium Tote ($285)

Naghedi's woven bags are popping up everywhere, but we can't resist this subdued neutral tone for winter. It's water-resistant and features an interior zipper pouch to keep your essentials organized. You can carry the straps in your hand, over your forearm, or over the shoulder.

Best Bow-Style Bag

Cuyana Mini Bow Leather Top Handle Bag ($298)

Sculptural and elegant, we love how this Cuyana bow bag can be worn around the shoulder with the gold chain or as a minimal clutch with the chain removed. It's crafted in Italy with a pebbled leather exterior, has an interior wall pocket, and also comes in black.

— Additional reporting by Natasha Marsh

Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.

Natasha Marsh (she/her) is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
